subject: Animal Abuse, Rights and Welfare
Horse Racing
organizations: People for the Ethical Treatment of Animals
lead_paragraph: The trainer Steve Asmussen broke with Scott Blasi, his assistant for 18 years, on Saturday as the authorities looked into allegations that the two had mistreated racehorses.
snippet: The trainer Steve Asmussen broke with Scott Blasi, his assistant for 18 years, on Saturday as the authorities looked into allegations that the two had mistreated racehorses.
